text:
The way of the Essentialist is different.  

The Essentialist designs a routine for achieving essentials.  

This routine makes essentials the default position.  

Yes, sometimes an Essentialist must still work hard.  

With the right routine, efforts yield greater results.  

Nonessentialists try to execute essentials by force.  

They allow nonessentials to be the default.  

Essentialists design a routine that enshrines essentials.  

This makes execution almost effortless.  

They make the essential the default position.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The Essentialist creates a routine that prioritizes essential tasks, making their execution nearly effortless.
